message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is highly valued by many of our customers. Given its quality and the benefits it provides, I believe it's worth more than $100. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I am offering it to you for $120. This price reflects the exceptional value and utility of the product. I trust it will meet your needs and expectations. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.
